data.name: Tic-Tac-Toe Winner
data.description:
# The Game of Tic-Tac-Toe

The game of Tic-Tac-Toe is played by two players, `X` and `O`. Each player takes a turn by placing their letter into an unoccupied square on a 3x3 grid. The winner is the first to gain 3 squares in a row either horizontally, vertically or diagonally.

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tic-tac-toe

---

# Task

Given a game board representation in which each of the 3 rows of the grid is separated by a pipe (`|`) character and empty squares by a dot (`.`) character, decide whether `X` won the game, `O` won the game or if it was a tie.

The messages should be one of the following:

* "Player X is the winner"
* "Player O is the winner"
* "Game is a tie"

---

For example, the following string:

```
xox|x.o|xo.
```

represents a board that looks like this:

```
x o x
x   o
x o
```

The result should be `"Player X is the winner"` because player X occupied the first column.
